last_episode_to_air.name: A Beautiful Family
last_episode_to_air.overview: Ana makes a decision and, with the help of Ceci and other accomplices, goes looking for Mariana before she leaves for Tijuana. Tere goes into labor.

name: Daughter from Another Mother
overview: After realizing their babies were exchanged at birth, two women develop a plan to adjust to their new lives: creating a single —and peculiar— family.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: After discovering their babies were exchanged at birth, two women develop a plan to adjust to their new lives: creating a single —and peculiar— family.

seasons.name: Season 2
seasons.overview: As Ana and Mariana go down a rocky road to make amends, new loves and exciting career opportunities shake their family dynamics to the core.

seasons.name: Season 3
seasons.overview: Ana and Mariana deal with a lawsuit and new business while maintaining the facade of their relationship. But chaos arises when true feelings blossom.

episodes.name: Eeny, Meeny, Miny, Moe
episodes.overview: Four months after their babies were swapped, workaholic Ana and student Mariana prepare to carry out the exchange. But what if they don't have to?

episodes.name: Welcome Home
episodes.overview: Mariana moves in with Ana and her family to wean Valentina. Tere, Mariana's mom, is surprised when Juan Carlos, Ana's husband, offers to help them.

episodes.name: Family Dynamics
episodes.overview: Pablo, Regina's dad, threatens to sue Mariana. Ana attends a class to bond with Valentina. Mariana reaches out to Anuar, her estranged dad.

episodes.name: Fatherhood
episodes.overview: Ana and Juan Carlos go to couples therapy. Pablo and Regina go on their first daddy-daughter date. Tere launches her beauty business.

episodes.name: My Family's Not Perfect
episodes.overview: Mariana starts looking for answers after Tere reveals a long-hidden truth. Juan Carlos wants Mariana out of the house, but Ana has a plan.

episodes.name: Dating
episodes.overview: Ana takes a week off work to think about a life-changing promotion. Mariana decides to get back into the dating scene through an app.

episodes.name: Quality Time
episodes.overview: Ana invites Mariana and her whole family for a weekend getaway at Valle de Bravo. Mariana becomes suspicious when she sees Tere and Juan Carlos arguing.

episodes.name: Lies
episodes.overview: Ana travels to Buenos Aires and bumps into someone from her past. As the babies start solid food, Mariana considers moving out. Ana has a health scare.

episodes.name: Baptism
episodes.overview: Although Ana wants the babies to be christened, Mariana wants a welcome ritual for Regina. But a secret uncovered threatens to ruin both celebrations.

1.name: Season 1
1.overview: After discovering their babies were exchanged at birth, two women develop a plan to adjust to their new lives: creating a single —and peculiar— family.

episodes.name: Mothers and Daughters
episodes.overview: Ana asks Cynthia, her former assistant, to get information about Regina, but Mariana is on to her. Ana and Juan Carlos meet to discuss their separation.

episodes.name: Safety Net
episodes.overview: Mariana and Pablo decide to get new jobs to make ends meet. Ana strikes a deal with her ex-boss. Ceci and Rodrigo go to a party to avoid their dad.

episodes.name: What’s Next?
episodes.overview: Mariana and Pablo are reluctant to put Regina in daycare. Tere partners up with Victor for a new business. Ana makes a career move that shocks Mariana.

episodes.name: Graduation
episodes.overview: Ana and Mariana can't see eye to eye on the maternity app. Everybody attends Ceci's graduation, which proves to be eventful.

episodes.name: Soldiers of Love
episodes.overview: Things get hectic when the two families end up in the same co-working space and Ferrán, the owner, starts flirting with Ana — and Mariana.

episodes.name: Poker Face
episodes.overview: Ana is determined to unmask Ferran's seduction, but Mariana wants to give him a chance. Victor prompts Juan Carlos to get back in to the dating world.

episodes.name: Divorce
episodes.overview: After Ferrán gets on Pablo and Juan Carlo's nerves, they meet with a lawyer. Mariana helps Ceci plan a romantic night with Dario, to Ana's dismay.

episodes.name: There’s No Escaping Fate
episodes.overview: When Pablo and Juan Carlos take legal action against Ana and Mariana, the women resort to an extreme solution to protect their families and business.

2.name: Season 2
2.overview: As Ana and Mariana go down a rocky road to make amends, new loves and exciting career opportunities shake their family dynamics to the core.

episodes.name: An Inconvenient Truth
episodes.overview: Pablo and Juan Carlos try to gather evidence to prove that Mariana and Ana are lying. Tere puts Victor to the test. Ferran tries to make Mariana jealous.

episodes.name: A Celebration of Love
episodes.overview: Ana and Mariana host a party to win new investors. Ferran and Mariana struggle to hide their relationship. Tere opens up to Mariana about her pregnancy.

episodes.name: Chocolates
episodes.overview: Choosing a school for the girls causes trouble between Mariana and Ana. Juan Carlos needs Ana's help to become the president of his family's company.

episodes.name: Santa Perpetua
episodes.overview: Ana and Mariana have a car accident, which leads to an intimate encounter. Juan Carlos bumps into an old flame. Ceci makes a decision about her future.

episodes.name: Moral Hangover
episodes.overview: Ana has a heart-to-heart with Mariana. Tere has a heated discussion with Victor's dad. Juan Carlos meets Fernanda's friends on a camping trip.

episodes.name: Lost and Found
episodes.overview: Ana goes on a date with another woman. Mariana moves in with Ferran. Pablo and Cynthia organize a dinner to deliver some very uncomfortable news.

episodes.name: The Apple and the Tree
episodes.overview: Mariana finds out a big secret about Ferran's past. Ana's reunion with her father does not turn out as she expected. Ceci starts working at Rorros.

episodes.name: Students and Teachers
episodes.overview: Ana runs into Juan Carlos at an ayahuasca ceremony. Mariana is offered a job outside the city. Ro asks Elena to help him woo his crush.

episodes.name: Imposter Syndrome
episodes.overview: Ana and Pablo make a plan to prevent Mariana from leaving. Cynthia and Pablo consider moving in together. Tere gets tested to determine her baby's health.

episodes.name: A Beautiful Family
episodes.overview: Ana makes a decision and, with the help of Ceci and other accomplices, goes looking for Mariana before she leaves for Tijuana. Tere goes into labor.

3.name: Season 3
3.overview: Ana and Mariana deal with a lawsuit and new business while maintaining the facade of their relationship. But chaos arises when true feelings blossom.
